Reviews.Title: “Unexplained occurrences, poor service”
Reviews.Author: Eire2002
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights sultan palace hotel comfortable breakfast 1 night 3am staff entered immediately woke speak heard saying sorry quickly left wife woke rang reception entered mistake allegedly organising taxi sick kid 104 staying 401 sick kid story true cant understand mistaken floor decided enter using staff key knocking ringing needless wife terrified couldnt sleep properly worse night staff exactly door knocking giving notice wonder note guests staying hours staff comes knocking door offering plate fruit left assured bolt door 2 stay couldnt front door hotel staff insist leave hotel morning kitchen door hotel nonenglish review below day left walked corner 3 police cars 6 policemen standing door discussing staff explanation night staff sit sofa street keeping eye door reception kept darkness day managers speak english properly told front door locked building refurbished door wasnt collapse unsafe turkish authorities wouldnt front door didnt explanation nights moving guests facing front hotel kitchen regardless story true suspect leave door hotel smuggled hotel doesnt feel paying 109 euro day 3 booked sea view night floor struggle sea tiny glimpse bay day moved 4th floor actually proper seaview balcony bit careful definition seaview

Reviews.Title: “Epitomy of Turkish hospitality!”
Reviews.Author: NeedToTravelOften
Reviews.Content: wonderful hotel amazingly welcoming staff sultan palace hotel absolutely fantastic moment arrived entrance thru kitchen according front door soon ironing terms local turkish govt hotel located 50 meters entrance mehmet pasha mosque 5 15 min foot hippodrome blue mosque basilica cistern hagia sophia topkapi palace little tram stations cemberlitas sultan ahmet hotel clean comfortable sound proofed windows helps dont woken morning call prayers roof terrace views sea marmara unfortunately furniture breakfast excellent varied staff friendly helpful offered airport pick arrival via email unfortunately read hotel information queries tips istanbul turkey hotel 10pm night looking eat staff helped saray restaurant food delivered hotel tl food absolutely fantastic greatly appreciate staff helped book hotel late night trip selcuk offered laptops free free wifi arrange taxis airport prepared breakfast departure 7am staff epitomy turkish hospitality plan return istanbul future definitely stay sultan palace hotel

Reviews.Title: “friendly and wonderfully located hotel”
Reviews.Author: HaniY
Reviews.Content: visit istanbul turkish friend recommended hotel stay 5 nights spacious clean elegant view overlooking city marmara sea hotel 3 minutes walking distance sultanahmet blue mosque 5 minutes sultanahmet metro station addition helpful friendly staff stay experience

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, lovely hotel”

Reviews.Content: pleasure stay boutique hotel march vacation amazing experience location spacious decorated wonderfuly comfortable clean friendly attitude nice atmosphere hotel staff helpful kinds issues definately reccomend time istanbul stay pleasure
